column5: Lost Island Lodge on Lac Seul is giving a fishing trip to four Wounded Warriors at no charge. What a great gesture for a great Lodge in Ontario. Wife and I are donating four rods and reels and lures to the cause. Just a way to say thanks to all those who protect our freedom. Mike Kansas

Great thing to do Mike, Let me know if I can do anything.I went thru the wounded warrior program during my Medical retirement and I have nothing but great things to say about all the wonderful people who supported us in so many ways during the recovery process,Joe,
Joe, Thanks for your offer. The last time I talked to Shane at Lost Island Lodge he said all was good and they didn't need anything else for the WW. Mike Kansas
